attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Address the problem of payment for visitors Visas from the Phillipines for legally married couples. At this time the cost is in excess of 400pounds. Can, the Prime Minister, not give legally married British citizens 21day visit without visa, as is the practice when coming to the Philippines. If that would require a minimum period of 5 years married then so be it. I am informed that the UK and the Philippines have a reciprocal agreement, this action should be included in the agreement.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
